title: Services
description: I provide services under the banner of StatsMatter which are helpful for Career driven Professional's, Companies and Startup's who want to transition into Artificial Intelligence driven products and techs.

content.title: WORKSHOPS & EVENTS
content.description: Most helpful for beginners. A Gentle introduction's to complex concepts and ideas related to Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning.

content.title: DATA DRIVEN PRODUCTS CONSULTANT & CONCEPTUALIZATION
content.description: Primarily aimed at companies and startup's having high end technical workforce and resources, looking for an outsider's perspective and want to transition to AI driven ecosystems.

content.title: PERSONALIZED LEARNING TRACKS (Online Sessions Available)
content.description: Catered courses and learning sessions for corporate training, classroom programs and one-to-one training.
